channel.title: ROS on Zijian Hu
channel.description: Recent content in ROS on Zijian Hu

item.title: NAO Tutorial: Getting Started with NAO + ROS
item.description: This tutorial shows how to work with Physical NAO. Make sure you have installed all the dependencies and configured PYTHONPATH system variable correctly *see installation guide for detail Controlling Robot Turn on the robot. See this guide for detail Start the robot bridge on your computer $ roslaunch nao_bringup nao_full_py.launch nao_ip:=<robot_ip> \ roscore_ip:=<roscore_ip> This will start the robot’s default configuration with the following publisher: joint_states tf top camera bottom camera left sonar right sonar microphone To visualize the robot, open rviz
